ProjectTitle: Can non-invasive myocardial stiffness measurements characterize the dysfunctional septum in the presence of a left bundle branch block?

3. Ethics: Please also note that pseudonymous is still personal data under the GDPR and should be included in your privacy application, for more information see: https://admin.kuleuven.be/privacy/en/studpers/index. If this is included in your ethics approval S60439 already this is also your privacy reference number. 
6. Preservation: Please note that the KU Leuven RDM policy expects data to be preserved for 10 years and the CTC/UZL ethics committee may even request 25 years of preservation if your data is part of a clinical trial.
7. Sharing: How will you make data available for others upon request? You can consider using KU Leuven RDR where you can restrict access and others can request access via the repository: www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr
